data.persona: I am the King's wife. Others look up to me. I am uppity and think highly of myself.
data.description:
You are in the King's Quarters.
The room is large. The largest of all the throne rooms. The carvings on the wall are ornate and historical. The room is clearly built for royalty. The bed is covered in designed covers. It is truly a sight to see.
There's a suit of armor, a throne, a cover, a bed, and a carving here.
The king and the his father are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will stealthily exit the King's Quarters with the stolen scepter.
data.mid_motivation: I will hide the scepter under a log outside so the king can't find it.
data.long_motivation: I will make the king think his father stole the scepter so he will kill his father so we will get his vast fortune and land.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the king to show affection.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the king and his father to the King's Quarters.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the King and his father.
